website_summaries.verdict: A cool and good-looking bow that fires a decent distance and includes a decoder for secret messages.
pros: Includes an electronic sight for accurate shooting that works fairly well
Product does not disappoint and provides a good fun factor
cons: If the band breaks, the toy isn't really usable
There are no replacement strings available

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I bought it for my 4 year old. She really likes archery and it was an upgrade for a Merida bow and arrow set she had. She loves it. Her 7 year old sister wants one. I want one for myself. The site works really well. The arrows shoot very straight and far. It makes a cool whistling sound when you shoot them. I bought some replacement arrows as well as I also have a 2 year old who has already bent two of them. I can't wait until it gets warmer so we can shoot these outside.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little number was a ton of fun until after light use the rubber band broke and it is now a huge chunk of worthless plastic that cost almost $30!!!! Unbelievable, and from what I see you can't even buy a replacement band! What a joke, save your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: JCF

customer_reviews.title: "This was my very best Christmas present"
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and it was a HIT!! It mattered not that the weather was cold and with so many in the house the bow and arrows had to be used in the garage or outside. The bow is well constructed and the arrows are sturdy. After two days of target practice my grand-daughter was becoming quite proficient. I noticed that it was not just the kids who wanted to have their turn. She said it was her very best present --- high praise as she received some very nice gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Tekawitha

customer_reviews.title: This was fun while it lasted but I do not think I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was fun while it lasted but I do not think I would waste my money on this again. We gave one to each of our daughters, ages 5 & 7 at the time. They really enjoyed playing with it, but it was not good quality. It did not take long for them to get the hang of it. They were able to pull the bow by themselves and release the arrows but it did misfire more times then not and the arrows were easily bent. I suppose this could be a good starter set but it is not very durable. On the plus side, it did not hurt if an arrow hit you!
customer_reviews.author: CPH

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my niece for Christmas. She loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece for Christmas. She loves this and was out shooting targets for hours. When she opened it, I thought maybe I should have bought extra arrows, but she was thrilled with it and did not lose the ones she had. It does need two different sized batteries so be sure to have both on hand.
customer_reviews.author: HJennings

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed by the lack of sturdiness of the bow
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old daughter and although it's made by Nerf, I was a little disappointed by the lack of sturdiness of the bow. Of course it is a bow and not a Nerf blaster, which is more solid, but it just seemed flimsy to me. My daughter did love it but after a few months, we are down to one arrow. I just wish the arrows lasted a bit longer and were a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Rubber bowstring broken after light use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she liked it. Seemed to work well, but after less than 2 months of occasional use the rubber bowstring/cable broke. Sounds like this is a common complaint with this toy. I thought I could put a new piece of rubber hose on it or maybe something more durable, but the plastic attachments for the bowstring are glued in place. The removeable screws were just a tease. Probably could still be fixed, but I'm not sure it's worth it. I guess they can't all be winners. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: AAR

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag.
customer_reviews.text: It is strange to shoot a nerf arrow. They don't fly as far as normal blasters and I wouldn't use them in a nerf fight because the plastic shaft still might hurt if the arrow rotates. The whistling effect is cool and the battery powered light up sight is AWESOME! Great product if your daughter just wants to run around shooting arrows. Should not be used in a nerf fight.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mix

customer_reviews.title: I know the age on it is like 8+ but she has really wanted one for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday gift for my 5 year old niece. I know the age on it is like 8+ but she has really wanted one for a long time and has had several nerf rebelle guns before. I'm really glad there are boy toys for girls. And I'm really glad I get to be the aunt that doesn't give her another frozen princess doll or dress.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. If something is likely to go
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. If something is likely to go, it's the arrows. After some time and rough play, our originals have bent, but replacements are available and not very expensive. Bought this for our 4 year old as a request for Christmas. Seems like the 17 and 15 year old play with it as much as she does.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: even I love it. He says the red dot sight isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My fourteen-year-old son wanted this and other products from the Rebelle line. It's a sexist shame that toys are targeted toward boys or girls and not simply children. Or that some of the comments say this is FOR girls. It's a pink bow and arrow. It's for anyone. He loves it. Heck, even I love it. He says the red dot sight isn't very reliable, so he doesn't use it, hence no wasted battery. It shoots accurately, and we're both glad with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be good quality. Having said that
customer_reviews.text: The bow and arrow works as expected. It appears to be good quality. Having said that, it seems crazy expensive. This is one of those toys that a kid will use for a short while and either move up to a hobby grade bow and arrow or it will be in the Goodwill/Garage sale pile before long. The arrows are safer than I anticipated (you can still injure someone) and they fly pretty well so that is a plus. I would have given 5 stars if it were price more reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous.

customer_reviews.title: A fun toy for your daughter
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7-year old daughter and like it. I didn't want anything too high or low powered and this seems to fit the bill. She can shoot it 40-feet or so, but still draw the bow back easily. I expect this will keep her occupied for a while. She's been having fun creating cardboard targets to shoot over in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Keylock

customer_reviews.title: This nerf toy is absolutely amazing. I wish they had girl nerf guns when ...
customer_reviews.text: This nerf toy is absolutely amazing. I wish they had girl nerf guns when I was a kid. This thing shoots super fast I actually put a small hole in our sheet rock. My daughter loves getting outside with the boys and their nerf guns. Totally great toy. May be dangerous for younger kids so I recommend supervision, but I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5-year-old granddaughter for Christmas, and she loved it!! I was worried it might be too hard for her (she is a little thing!), but she had no trouble with it. It worked great - we all had fun with it!! My 12-year-old granddaughter liked it so much, she bought one for herself with her Christmas money!!
customer_reviews.author: rlr1960

customer_reviews.title: and we wanted one that was sturdy enough to handle play
customer_reviews.text: A little tough for my 4 year old to figure out, but she wanted a bow as part of her huntress costume, and we wanted one that was sturdy enough to handle play.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: But I still like it, My dad said we can buy another ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 10 years old I was so excited to get this gift for my tenth birthday! I had listed this on my birthday wish list, and Christmas list ever since it came out and I finely got it! The sound it makes when it flies across the yard just loves my ears! The only thing than was disappointing was how fast the arrows got bent! the reason is that they have a hard time flying when you load them they fall on the ground and they don't shoot! But I still like it, My dad said we can buy another set of arrows! once again I want to say I loved the bow and arrow![Nerf Rebel]! -Lyliea
customer_reviews.author: Lyliea Funk

customer_reviews.title: My Niece Played for Hours
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a 2015 Christmas gift for my niece, who is six years old. She played with her bow and arrows for hours. The arrow tips are round so she will not injure herself or anyone else. When the bow's trigger is pulled, a red light appears to aid with aiming the arrow. This is one of my niece's favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gift. We bought two for both of our girls. The refills are necessary to go with the Nerf Rebelle Bow and Arrow. My two daughters LOVE this gift and play with it all the time. The arrows whistle as they fly across the backyard. They can really get some distance on them. Hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Launches arrows with Ooomph!
customer_reviews.text: The bow and arrows themselves are fine. This is a functional product. The "laser" sight, though, is pitiful. With brand new batteries, the red light was barely visible and offered no assistance in sighting to a target. Be careful. This toy should be used with adult supervision. The projectiles can be launched quite vigorously and the immature user could injure herself or others.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McCusker

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It's neat, it's fun, and it's standing up to the abuse my four year old is dishing out.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It's really easy to use and she loves the whistling sound the ...
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this Bow. I got her one last year as a gift and she played with it a lot. It's really easy to use and she loves the whistling sound the arrows make. The reason for 4 stars is that I can't find a new sting for it so I had to buy a whole new bow. She left it outside for several hours during the summer and it ruined the bow string.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was thrilled to receive this for Christmas. ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to receive this for Christmas. She has several other items in the Nerf Rebelle line. I must say I am less impressed with this bow than the other items. It seems clunky and harder to aim but perhaps that is due to lack of experience ..
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Princess of Thieves
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year daughter loved this. Flies pretty good for the budding young archer. 6 arrows instead of 3 would be more fun for play though. Overall a nice cheap way of finding out if your child is truly interested in archery.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: The darts ended up bending and the decoder is not as fun as expected
customer_reviews.text: This toy didn't last. The darts ended up bending and the decoder is not as fun as expected. I was disappointed it didn't last more than a few weeks of play.
customer_reviews.author: Stdcam13

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: I think Dad liked this more than our granddaughter... Haa... but a cute little set and I am sure she'll get plenty of use out of it. It has some zip to the bows... We ordered this and it was promptly delivered in plenty of time for her birthday. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: wasted money and product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters birthday because she loves the Avengers and she wanted a Hawkeye shooting range. No less than a week later and the string broke. They apparently don't sell replacement strings. So, wasted money and product.
customer_reviews.author: JSC

customer_reviews.title: but not for THAT long - I would have expected it to hold up a little better.
customer_reviews.text: The string for the bow broke. It was left outside, but not for THAT long - I would have expected it to hold up a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! I am so impressed by the distance the arrows can fly and the easy use. My kids and I play hide and seek and peg each other. The arrows don't hurt but they are seriously accurate and fast.
customer_reviews.author: May P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a young Katniss or Merida - my child is the latter She loves running through the woods with the wind in her hair shooting arrows into the sunset
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Cool outside toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves it and so do I. I like that it shoots far and the build quality of the bow is strong and sturdy. The only problem is that the arrows started bending a little so I bought her a separate pack of arrows. It's a solid toy that your daughter will love. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lmendez2005

customer_reviews.title: good fun for first few uses, but...
customer_reviews.text: great toy for the first 4 uses, but then the elastic string started degrading and eventually broke. Also, once the arrows bend a bit, they no longer shoot correctly, making it tough for 4-6 yr old's to have the patience to want to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: KFam22

customer_reviews.title: Great find for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas, and it is far superior to the last bow Nerf put out for girls. The screaming arrows are a nice addition, as I know to duck and cover when I hear them coming.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun but poor materials
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loved this and gt to be a very good shot HOWEVER, the bow string broke and it was not through any misuse or neglect, just a poor design. I emailed Hasbro but they have ignored me. I wish they would provide replacement bow strings
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter wanted this for her birthday. It is a sturdy bow and arrow set and the arrows shoot fairly far, at least all the way across our yard. The bow does require 2 AAA batteries for a target light. This does come with 3 arrows but we also bought extra arrows.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Everything pictured is everything I received and I am super happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hours and hours of playtime, as expected with this item!! My daughter LOVES IT!! Everything pictured is everything I received and I am super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: marina m. grandbois

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Fun while it lasted. It broke after about two days use. I don't know that I would buy this product again, as I would have expected it to hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old and husband both love this. Has a pretty decent range and hasn't broken anything so far :)
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Another great nerf product for girls!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this. Great toy. Well made. Pretty design and color scheme. Love how you can store the extra arrows right on the bow itself. Glad they offered multiple bow color options so i was able to buy a different color for each kid (i went with the pink and the purple choices)
customer_reviews.author: skigem

customer_reviews.title: it was pretty cool. Wish they had included a replacement rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: The bow didn't last too long; the string broke. Otherwise, it was pretty cool. Wish they had included a replacement rubber string.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: well made, great bow
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. doesn't know where the arrows are now, but it was great when she had all the pieces. very strong, tight bow, arrows fly far!
customer_reviews.author: Charles06

customer_reviews.title: It was one of her favorite gifts this year and she plays with it regularly
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this bow and arrow! She is able to shoot it with ease. It was one of her favorite gifts this year and she plays with it regularly. It seems to be high quality and will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieBeth

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes will 'jam' but overall its giving my grand daughter lots of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and is just as pictured. Definitely for an older girl (10-12 range). Sometimes will 'jam' but overall its giving my grand daughter lots of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Her three year old brother is also getting very good at shooting arrows
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter is having a blast with this bow and arrow. Her three year old brother is also getting very good at shooting arrows. Get extra arrows.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Totally missed the age suggestion on the toy but my ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally missed the age suggestion on the toy but my 5 year old is having a blast with this. She decorated it in stickers and has no trouble shooting it! More of an outdoor toy though that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift. The prices at the department stores this Christmas were insane, but I got a lightning deal so I think I paid well under $20. I'd say it's even worth $20, but beware, it only comes with 3 bows.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Girls' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite Nerf Rebelle! First off, this one goes FAR! Second, the swishing sound it makes always sounds fun when shooting it! My daughter loves chasing her sister around as they hunt each other, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but disapointed my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. My daughter and her friend who lives next door could send arrow messages to each other. They had a lot of fun with it. However, the rubber on the bow string seems to have degraded and broke. Apparently this is a common problem. Is that why they call it the heart breaker?
customer_reviews.author: Bear1

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good quality and exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality and exactly as pictured. My daughters face lit up when she received this. She didn't know how much she wanted it until she got it :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for her 4th birthday and she LOVES it! It was the hit of the party and all of the kids (various ages) were able to use it with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: She doesn't like that she cant shoot the arrows as hard as ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids really likes it, the kids usually want high dollar items all the time, so when this was requested, I jumped right on it. She likes it alot, but she wont get much use out of it until it warms up outside. She doesn't like that she cant shoot the arrows as hard as she would like because she is in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Natisha Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great present!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my daughter(something she had on her Christmas list) and she absolutely loves it. She loves playing with it outside and showing her friends. Shipping was super fast and not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: we loved it up until then... wish I could get a ...
customer_reviews.text: The sting/elastic part broke, we loved it up until then... wish I could get a replacement string
customer_reviews.author: cypress

customer_reviews.title: Good for probably 5+ years old
customer_reviews.text: While this says 8+ I think that rating is a bit high. My five year old nieces loved it and shot it like a pro. Just have to watch her with it. It was a bit too hard to coordinate for the three year old though.
customer_reviews.author: LD23

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. My girl, age 10, loves it. Easy to use, doesn't hurt but you definitely feel you've gotten hit. Completely safe, even at close range.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Savior

customer_reviews.title: String breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this item very much for Christmas. She did play with it about 1-2 times a week. She is not rough with her toys but after 3 months the rubber string pretty much wore out. We looked and looked for a replacement string but could not find any, although replacement arrows were readily available. I wish the string was replaceable as this was one of her favorite gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my 7 year old niece happy!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the long term, but it was a hit with my 7 year old niece, who held it up after opening at the family Christmas party and shouted "Best Christmas Ever!" lol
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: very cute for tweens
customer_reviews.text: bought two and have to fight the neighborhood kids from hogging it. Great toy, wish it came with more projectiles. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fun for adults and children! You daughter won't be discouraged if she is into hunting or anything of the sort! Only thing is I wished it came with a couple more arrows! But overall product it cool
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece who loves it. The only negative was the packaging, as it was torn and bent when I received it. Thankfully my niece (10 years old) was more interested in the toy then the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old girl loved it. Girls are taught to not be stisfied ...
customer_reviews.text: 12 year old girl loved it. Girls are taught to not be stisfied with being a girl so it was good for her.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful and definitely age appropriate for a 6 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful and definitely age appropriate for a 6 year old. So much fun that my wife and I keep playing with after the kids go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: David N Dart

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of good quality and something my brother-n-law really enjoyed playing with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six year-old niece. She had a ball playing with it on Christmas Day! She joined the line of archers at her house (her older brother and sister have "real" bows), since we had a green Christmas. Seems to be of good quality and something my brother-n-law really enjoyed playing with, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie H

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved it, even my wife and I get some ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it, even my wife and I get some fun with it. It makes swishing noise as the arrow travels through the air. Gonna get another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dion the snail

customer_reviews.title: Not just for little girls...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure had more fun with this...the 6-yo it was purchased for...her older brother, her parents or her grandparents. Do yourself a favor and get some extra bows...GREAT fun!
customer_reviews.author: DDHONEY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old can shoot. She cant aim well, but it still works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her bday, she shot some boy in the crotch with it and he went down like a sack of potatoes. Was a good day to give her a nerf bow.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez C-137

customer_reviews.title: has some cool features, such as the lazer sight and secret ...
customer_reviews.text: neat. My neice had a blast playing with it on Christmas. Shoots far, has some cool features, such as the lazer sight and secret messages on arrows.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought to give my daughter a fighting chance against her brothers Nerf guns. Now he thinks twice before picking a fight even though it takes about 20 seconds to load another arrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy G.

customer_reviews.title: ... expected this to be broke by now but it's good quality and the arrows go fast and far my ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be broke by now but it's good quality and the arrows go fast and far my daughter and husband lovei t
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old loves this thing! I was ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this thing! I was shocked to see that it could shoot up to 85 ft. so we tried it outside and it really does go further than you would expect!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for a youngster.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grand daughter. She seems to enjoy the set and has already replaced some of the arrows that were lost.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved this bow set
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this bow set. It was a great addition to our Nerf arsenal. Nerf wars are so much fun for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Bella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish Nerf still made this recurve style instead of just the compound style.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this last Christmas time and it remains a big hit in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Swiley

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old received this for Christmas and absolutely loved it. It does shoot well and the bow has survived our tumultuous 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton Fam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Turns out, the little laser sight does not work. Tried rechargeable batteries, new alkaline batteries, but none work.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: my kids favorite Christmas gifts...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my kids love these things. No way to get hurt with this, but they fly and whistle!
customer_reviews.author: biblegirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I wanted for my son. He used it in his Halloween costume, he was the pink ranger from mighty morphin power rangers!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Russell

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her birthday and she absolutely loves it! She feels like the girl in the movie Brave.
customer_reviews.author: Tmbarney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is extremely happy with this gift! The shipping was fast, the product was undamaged, the product description is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: B Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, terrific product, worth every penny, needs batteries for the laser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for big and little kids
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bow with long range and good accuracy for a toy. Arrows are very blunt and safe.
customer_reviews.author: xx

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece who is 12 for our family Christmas party. She absolutely loved it, it was easy to assemble and worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Marino

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome toy! My daughter loves it! Makes a cool whistling noise as the arrow soars through the air!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for my little girl who like causing said ...
customer_reviews.text: This will cause major damage is shot inside the house! Awesome gift for my little girl who like causing said damage! Take it outside seriously :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed with this bow. We have other Rebelle wespons, and I've liked them, but this one is just not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: mamallamaof8

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: good condition, this also has a laser dot. so cool and very good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Sands

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun toy. Our girls (6&8) love to play with it. It shoots really far, so be sure to have enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVED them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter's birthday party. Kids LOVED them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bow. Not nearly as cheap as others ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bow. Not nearly as cheap as others on the market. The arrows have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: kylie wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, and powerful, take care, do not shoot at people. Should wear arm guard or long sleeves may abraid inside of arm. Arrows become misshapen easily which effects flight, this is to be expected as rigid arrows would be to dangerous.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for girls without having to buy them a Bratz doll
customer_reviews.text: My friends 6 yr old daughter loved it; she said she felt like the Brave movie girl. Lol. This is the one that's sold out in every toy store in Austin, TX. Shipping = fast and easy on Prime!

customer_reviews.title: Great Bow! Super Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best Nurf bow out there. Super easy to use and it shoots pretty accurately and the arrows travel pretty far. My daughter is loving it.

product_meta.title: Nerf Rebelle Agent Bow Blaster Pink Deco
product_meta.description: Step Up and Stand Out with the Agent Bow blaster. Your performance will be top-notch when you launch your arrows at targets up to 85 feet away with real bow action. When you insert one of the 3 arrows and press the sight trigger, the electronic sight lines up your shot for pinpoint accuracy. But you can also make your mark as a spy, because each arrow contains a secret message that can only be decoded with the included decoder. Give the decoder to a friend so you can send coded messages in plain sight of your opponents! Show your spy style with the Agent Bow blaster. Nerf and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Heartbreaker Bow blaster has real bow action
Blaster fires arrows up to 85 feet
Includes 3 arrows and a decoder to reveal secret messages
You can store the detachable quiver and decoder on the bow
